import os
import click
from .fed_learn import fed_learn

# Enable click
os.environ['LC_ALL'] = 'C.UTF-8'
os.environ['LANG'] = 'C.UTF-8'


@click.group()
def cli():
    pass


cli.add_command(fed_learn)



[docs]def main():
    """ main fn

    """
    cli()



if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
